davinci.util.force

Class DragForce

  • java.lang.Object
    • davinci.util.force.AbstractForce
      • davinci.util.force.DragForce
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Force

    public class DragForce
extends AbstractForce
    Implements a viscosity/drag force to help stabilize items.
    Author:
    jeffrey heer
